main event: On March 6, 1957, a ground visual observation reported an object shaped like a derby hat, approximately the size of a basketball, making a low growling sound in Great Meadows, New Jersey.
interesting points: The object was reported to be hovering at an altitude of about 30 feet., Witnesses described the object as having shimmering rays beneath it., The object's color was noted as white and its size compared to that of a basketball., The sighting caught the attention of passers-by, indicating its visibility., Despite the observations, the conclusion drawn was that it might have been a balloon or aircraft due to insufficient data.
sighted object: object shaped like a derby hat
witness description: a civilian couple out for a drive
